mapper.insert: insert into mr_job_tasks_monitor( consume_lane, monitor_date, monitor_ymd, monitor_hour, monitor_minute, monitor_second, insert_succes, insert_failure, update_succes, update_failure, delete_succes, delete_failure ) values ( #{consumeLane}, #{monitorDate}, #{monitorYmd}, #{monitorHour}, #{monitorMinute}, #{monitorSecond}, #{insertSucces}, #{insertFailure}, #{updateSucces}, #{updateFailure}, #{deleteSucces}, #{deleteFailure} )
mapper.update: update mr_job_tasks_monitor set consume_lane = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.consumeLane}, monitor_date = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.monitorDate}, monitor_ymd = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.monitorYmd}, monitor_hour = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.monitorHour}, monitor_minute = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.monitorMinute}, monitor_second = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.monitorSecond}, insert_succes = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.insertSucces}, insert_failure = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.insertFailure}, update_succes = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.updateSucces}, update_failure = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.updateFailure}, delete_succes = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.deleteSucces}, delete_failure = #{mrJobTasksMonitor.deleteFailure} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, consume_lane AS consumeLane, monitor_date AS monitorDate, monitor_ymd AS monitorYmd, monitor_hour AS monitorHour, monitor_minute AS monitorMinute, monitor_second AS monitorSecond, insert_succes AS insertSucces, insert_failure AS insertFailure, update_succes AS updateSucces, update_failure AS updateFailure, delete_succes AS deleteSucces, delete_failure AS deleteFailure from mr_job_tasks_monitor where id = #{id}

select id, consume_lane AS consumeLane, monitor_date AS monitorDate, monitor_ymd AS monitorYmd, monitor_hour AS monitorHour, monitor_minute AS monitorMinute, monitor_second AS monitorSecond, insert_succes AS insertSucces, insert_failure AS insertFailure, update_succes AS updateSucces, update_failure AS updateFailure, delete_succes AS deleteSucces, delete_failure AS deleteFailure from mr_job_tasks_monitor where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
